Text:
function EP03_28_02()
  --.結-3B【9月第4週】「アンタの背中に憧れて」
  SaveData.Title = "アンタの背中に憧れて"

  --//BG：病院の廊下
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG010aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM06.wav")

  MSG([[ After Minato headed to the academy, I decided to visit the hospital where Mariccho was admitted. ]])

  MSG([[ I had two goals. First, to tidy up around Mariccho in place of busy Minato. ]])

  MSG([[ The other was to have Mariccho listen to this restless feeling that's filling my chest right now. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0486.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "Haa... Coming all the way to the hospital to have the sleeping princess hear my complaints... now I can’t even laugh at Minato anymore." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0487.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "But if Mariccho listens to me, maybe this fog in my chest will..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ While muttering to myself to brush away my anxieties, I arrived in front of Mariccho’s hospital room. ]])

  MSG([[ As I tried to enter and grabbed the handle of the sliding door, I noticed someone talking from inside the room. ]])
  --//SE：誰かの囁く声

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0488.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "Who else could it be besides Minato or me...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ Quietly, I slightly opened the sliding door and peeked inside. There, in front of Mariccho’s bed, stood a woman I vaguely recognized. ]])

  MSG([[ That woman seemed to be speaking to the still-sleeping Mariccho. ]])

  MSG([[ Eavesdropping, I barely caught what she was saying―― ]])

  --//SE：誰かの囁く声

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0489.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 (…Eh!? Did she just say she’s the one who cornered Mariccho?) ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0490.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 (Right. That person is from Yuriai Private Academy… No way.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ Just the partial content I managed to hear sent chills down my spine. No way that "she" is the culprit who cornered Mariccho. ]])

  MSG([[ I can't even imagine how shocked kind-hearted Minato would be if he found out unexpectedly. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0491.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "I mustn’t make Minato suffer anymore... I have to tell him myself." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ I quietly left the hospital room to avoid being noticed by "her." ]])

  MSG([[ Then, as I was about to head to Yuriai Private Academy, I suddenly recalled this morning's events. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0492.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 (Af-after all that happened... how am I supposed to face him?) ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0493.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 (Knowing Minato, he might even be waiting for me... Ugh, I’m such an idiot for going mental right before the Princess Election.) ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0494.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "No... I can't become more of a burden to Minato." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ Meeting Minato in this fragile state and lashing out would be the worst. ]])

  MSG([[ After much hesitation, I gave up on going to Yuriai Private Academy. ]])

  MSG([[ But the words from this morning must be troubling Minato. I don’t want to keep being a burden to him. ]])

  MSG([[ Disgusted with my own weakness, I decided to call Minato. ]])

  --　　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)

  --//BG：校門前
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG005aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

  MSG([[ I unconsciously walked to the deserted school gate. ]])

  MSG([[ There's no way I would meet Akira here. ]])

  MSG([[ After all, I came to Yuriai Private Academy leaving her behind. ]])

  MSG([[ Even though Akira was suffering, I prioritized everyone at the academy. ]])

  MSG([[ I held onto a faint hope that maybe she would come after me. ]])

  MSG([[ I felt utterly pathetic. ]])
  --//SE：着信音
PLAY_SE("SEb011.wav")
WAIT(500)

  MSG([[ When I noticed my phone ringing, I saw Akira’s name on the screen. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0762.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "H-hello! Akira!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ I hurriedly answered, hearing Akira’s faint voice. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0495.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "Minato, I’m sorry for worrying you this morning. I’m calmer now, so please leave me alone." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0763.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "L-leave you alone? What’s that supposed to mean!? That’s impossible!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0496.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "...I realized that I’m the biggest burden to you." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0497.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "Watching Minato lately, I see there’s someone else you want to spend the school festival with, right? Go make memories with that person." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0764.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "Akira, that’s not true at all. I want to go around the festival with you, and I want you to watch the Princess Election too." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0765.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "I even had Hiyu and Lira prepare seats so you can watch the election peacefully. Watching it with them will make you feel safe." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0766.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "So please... don’t say such sad things, and come to Yuriai Private Academy." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0498.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "...Alright. I have something I need to tell you, so once I’ve sorted my feelings, I will watch the Princess Election. But that’s my limit." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0499.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "Minato... you must properly enjoy your youth. My greatest happiness is seeing you smile." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0767.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "A-Akira!? Contact me when you get to school, okay!? Akira, Akira――" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
  --//SE：通話の切れる音
PLAY_SE("SEb020.wav")
WAIT(500)

  MSG([[ Without another word, the call ended, and I stood there stunned. ]])

  MSG([[ It’s true that when I thought about who I wanted to see the White Sun Festival with, someone other than Akira came to mind. ]])

  MSG([[ Maybe Akira had noticed my true feelings. ]])

  MSG([[ The fact that someone even more important than Akira or Marika-nee was starting to grow in my heart. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0768.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "Sorry for making you feel lonely, Akira." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ I mustn’t cry. Even though Akira was concerned for me. If I sulk here, everything will be ruined. ]])

  MSG([[ Akira said her greatest happiness is seeing me smile. ]])

  MSG([[ For Akira’s sake, I need to switch my feelings properly and enjoy the White Sun Festival. ]])

  MSG([[ That is the only thing I can do for her as family right now. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0769.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "Ah... m-makeup..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ I realized my makeup was starting to come off because I kept wiping my tears with my handkerchief. ]])

  MSG([[ I thought it was still not obvious, but since the multipurpose restroom is nearby, I’d better touch up my makeup. ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)

  --//BG：多目的トイレ
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG007aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006" , 1000,false)

  MSG([[ As I was about to fix my makeup, I suddenly remembered a recent exchange with Lira. ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

  --//BG：1-A教室
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG014aa")

PLAY_BGM("BGM15.wav")

  --//BU：リラ（通常）
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask035" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0363.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "By the way, Erika, did you buy new panties or something?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0770.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "Eh!? W-why would you ask that!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07eb")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0364.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "Nuhuhuh~ <sprite="Emoji" name="note"> You seemed calmer than before when your skirt got raised~" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ia")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0365.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "I wondered if you bought panties you don’t mind others seeing~" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0771.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "N-no comment." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ca")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0366.wav")

  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "Ah, shoot... Speaking of panties, I still haven’t apologized to Minato-kun about the trunk thing." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07da")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0367.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "Ahhh, what was I thinking? I’m seriously the worst, but apologizing now feels pointless..." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0772.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "M-Minato probably isn’t worried! Lira-san, I understand your situation too!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ba")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0368.wav")

  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "Nope, you gotta make it right. You showed Minato-kun’s underwear to the whole school after all." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ea")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0369.wav")

  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "Hey, the White Sun Festival’s coming! I wanna treat Minato-kun, so could you tell him to come to our class if he has time?" ]])

STOP_BGM(2000)

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask035",1000,false)

  --//BG：多目的トイレ
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG007aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0773.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "R-right. I need to remove my makeup and head to Lira-san’s cafe." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ There’s still time before the Princess Election. Since I have to fix my makeup anyway, I’ll go to Lira-san’s cafe once as Minato first, then fix it. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0774.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "I’m sure Akira wants that too." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ When I thought about who I wanted to spend the White Sun Festival with, the person who came to mind was Lira-san. ]])

  MSG([[ I want to believe remembering her now isn’t a coincidence. ]])

  MSG([[ Without wasting time, I quickly removed my makeup and changed into the boys’ uniform I had just in case. ]])

  MSG([[ I hurried to classroom 1-B where Lira-san’s cafe was held. ]])

  --　　　　　◆
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM08.wav")

  --//BG：1-B教室
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG014ab")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000,false)

  MSG([[ The classroom itself was pretty much an ordinary class B room. ]])

  MSG([[ Inside, students in all kinds of costumes were packed together. ]])

  --//BU：モブ女子生徒Ｅ、モブメイド、モブ体操服生徒Ｅ
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB10aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB11aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
  LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB10ab")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("cosplayer_0001.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Cosplay Staff】
 "Welcome back, Master!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0583.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "Ah, th-thank you..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

  MSG([[ Caught off guard by the unexpected scene, I answered half-heartedly. ]])

  MSG([[ Guided to a corner seat, I took another look around the room and noticed something interesting. ]])

  MSG([[ Not only the staff, but the guests also all wore cosplay to varying degrees. ]])

  MSG([[ Maid outfits, gym uniforms, swimsuits, kigurumi, butlers. There were even people dressed in full-fledged game character costumes. ]])

  MSG([[ I’d heard it was a cosplay cafe, but it was even more chaotic than I imagined. ]])
  --//BU：リラ（体操服・笑顔）
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04ea")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,200,0)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0370.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "Ah, Minato-kun! You actually came!" ]])

  MSG([[ Lira-san entered carrying a cardboard box. ]])

  MSG([[ Wearing a gym uniform. Like everyone else, she seemed to be in cosplay. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0584.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "Lira-san! Wow, what an amazing cafe. Can guests really cosplay too?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04ia")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0371.wav")

  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "Yeah! Did you freak out? We have everything from our own clothes to handmade costumes<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04eb")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0372.wav")

  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "The regular maid cafe got taken by Uran-senpai’s class, so we made a space where everyone can cosplay at school." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0585.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "That’s so like you. Each outfit looks far from the cheap feeling of ready-made costumes." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04ca")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0373.wav")

  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "Wow, you’ve got a sharp eye! You know more than I thought about cosplay outfits." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0586.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "Ah!! Erika's interested in cosplay..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04fa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0374.wav")

  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "Ah, I see. That makes sense then." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04ia")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0375.wav")

  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "So, what will your order be, customer<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0587.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "I'll keep the outfit as is, please." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ After ordering hot coffee and pancakes, Lira-san answered lightly and left the classroom. ]])

  --//BU：なし
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
  LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InSine)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
  WAIT(500)
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask015",1000,false)

  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG014ab")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask015",1000,false)

  --//BU；リラ（体操服・笑顔）
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04eb")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,200,0)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

  MSG([[ After a while, she returned carrying a silver tray with a teacup and pancakes. ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04ea")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0376.wav")

  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "Sorry for the wait~ As promised, today’s on me. No charge, and I put lots of strawberries on it—enjoy!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0588.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "The kitchen is in another room, right?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0377.wav")

  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "Yeah. This room's just for serving and cosplay; the prep room next door is our kitchen." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0378.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "I don’t want stains from cooking on our costumes, after all." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0589.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "But about your costume, Lira-san..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04da")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0379.wav")

  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "Don’t say it. I got so focused on making costumes for the others, I forgot my own." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04ia")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0380.wav")

  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "Well, some folks like this look on me anyway~" ]])

  MSG([[ So that’s why she’s just in a plain gym uniform. ]])

  MSG([[ She prioritized others so much she forgot her own. It’s so like caring Lira-san I couldn’t help but smile. ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04ea")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0381.wav")

  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "The other costumes are pretty serious, so please take a look." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0590.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "Okay. I’ll enjoy it." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04ia")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0382.wav")

  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "So stiff! You’re a guest, relax and let loose!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ha")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0591.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "U-uhhh..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04fa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0383.wav")

  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "Cute as heck." ]])

  MSG([[ Lira-san sat next to me and we kept chatting. ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0384.wav")

  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "Have you dropped by Erika’s class yet? It’s rare to see both of you together, so it’s a great chance." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0592.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "Of course. I plan to greet her later. Though, our schedules might not match..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04fa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0385.wav")

  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "I know about her family situation, but your timing’s terrible. But that’s typical for the clumsy Ikusa family." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04ea")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0386.wav")

  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "Try to sync up and make fans who ship the Ikusa family happy." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0593.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "S-ship? What’s that?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04ga")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0387.wav")

  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "Eh...? You don’t know that term!? Seriously...?" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04fa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0388.wav")

  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "It means two people almost like lovers, so don’t worry about it." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0594.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "I do worry! I’m not a lover with Erika!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ More than almost lovers, it’s more like almost the same person. ]])

  MSG([[ Because I am the person. ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04ca")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0389.wav")

  MSG([[
  【Lira】
 "You’re seriously rejecting it too much. Are you two not on good terms? Is the reason you never appear together a no-co-star clause?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0595.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "No, it’s not that... We’re cousins, but we grew up like siblings, so it feels complicated." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04eb")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0390.wav")

  MSG([[
